code: function executeSkill(context) { const sourcePiece = context.piece; const targetEnemy = selectTarget({ type: 'piece', range: 5, filter: 'enemy' }); if (!targetEnemy || targetEnemy.needsTargetSelection) { return targetEnemy; } const damage = Math.round(sourcePiece.attack * context.skill.powerMultiplier); const damageResult = dealDamage(sourcePiece, targetEnemy, damage, 'physical', context.battle, context.skill.id); if (damageResult.success) { addStatusEffectById(targetEnemy.instanceId, 'bleeding'); } return { message: sourcePiece.name + 'ä½¿ç”¨å‡ºè¡€ä¹‹åˆƒï¼Œå¯¹' + targetEnemy.name + 'é€ æˆ' + damage + 'ç‚¹ä¼¤å®³ï¼Œå¹¶æ–½åŠ äº†æµè¡€çŠ¶æ€', success: true }; }
